select count(1) from (select d.am_std, d.pm_std, u.name, d.description, COALESCE(r.stock, 0) as stock from (select * from doctor
and department_id = #{departmentId} and status & #{status} != 0
) as d inner join (select id as user_id, name, gender, phone, email from user
and gender & #{gender} != 0 and role & #{role} != 0
) as u on u.user_id = d.user_id left join (select doctor_id, COALESCE(sum(1), 0) as stock from register where status != 8 and section = #{section} and date between #{beginDate} and #{endDate} group by doctor_id) as r on r.doctor_id = d.id ) as tmp
stock < am_std
stock < pm_std
and name like concat ('%', #{name}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
